Loki's season finale is here, and the man behind the curtain has been revealed to be The One Who Remains, AKA Kang the Conqueror! In this video we break down all of the Marvel Cinematic Universe Easter Eggs and references, and explain the mechanics of the new timestream in the MCU. The episode has numerous connections to the Avengers, Ant-Man, Endgame, and many, many more.
